summary.p: Unescapes any escaped characters in the input string.

param.name: text
param.p: The input string containing the text to convert.

returns.p: A string of characters with any escaped characters converted to their unescaped form.

remarks.p: As an example, Unescape replaces \x61 with a and \n with a new-line character (ASCII 10). REGEX_UNESCAPE reverses the transformation done by REGEX_ESCAPE. (Of course, REGEX_ESCAPE cannot perfectly reverse REGEX_UNESCAPE because it cannot deduce from an unescaped string which characters may have been previously escaped.)
